posts.content:
Selling 65 t2 split, in poor condition, to fully recover. Whole body complete and right except on the roof with a few dents who played in the arches of support, but of relatively simple resolution. Missing: 4 wheels, 1 glass, 1 spring of the front door on the left side, rear-view mirrors and headlights front and back, the back seat, upholstery and other interior details. Do not have engine, has the gearbox and the front seats, fuel tank, bumpers. As you can see everything needs restoration. Documents in order (although there is an important detail to explain personally to potential stakeholders who have the courage to take this van). Ships from Portugal.
The structure with wheels that can be seen beneath the van is not included, but I can borrow for easy transport.

Price: best offer from 1500 â‚¬

contact: pedrofferreira@sapo.pt
Problem with documents solved, added the missing glass and the front left door's suport spring.
this van is still waiting for a new owner, although the hard work needed to do, is fully restorable, it is not parts suplier, despite the topic has been moved to this section.
the price for this portuguese spec bus is negotiable.
